deck.name: PSYCHOKINESIS
deck.description:
While this card is in play, cards cannot leave Ranger discard piles.
When this card resolves, drain 2 [ENERGY] and each Ranger must discard 1 random card from their hand.

deck.name: ASTRAL VORTEX
deck.description: While this card is in play, each time a Ranger deals any amount of [HIT] to an enemy card without the GUARD keyword, drain 1 [ENERGY] and that Ranger must discard the top card of their deck.

deck.name: WRATH STAFF
deck.description: One Ranger must discard the top 2 cards of their deck. Then deal 4 damage to that Ranger.

deck.name: SHATTERBOLT
deck.description: Deal an amount of damage to each Ranger equal to the number of Rangers in this battle.

deck.name: DARK MATTER WAVE
deck.description: Each Ranger must reveal a random card from their hand. Deal 3 damage to each Ranger, increased by 1 for each [SHIELD] on their revealed card.

deck.name: HEAD OF CYCLOPSIS (Undamaged)
deck.description: Rangers cannot use Zord abilities.

deck.name: CORE OF CYCLOPSIS (Undamaged)
deck.description: At the end of each battle, move 1 hit token from each other Cyclopsis component card to this card.

deck.name: RIGHT ARM OF CYCLOPSIS (Undamaged)
deck.description: Each time a Ranger attacks another Cyclopsis component card, deal 2 damage to that Ranger.

deck.name: LEFT ARM OF CYCLOPSIS (Undamaged)
deck.description: Each other Cyclopsis component card has +1 health.

deck.name: RIGHT LEG OF CYCLOPSIS (Undamaged)
deck.description: At the start of each battle, draw and resolve 1 Cyclopsis enemy card.

deck.name: LEFT LEG OF CYCLOPSIS (Undamaged)
deck.description: At the end of each battle, draw and resolve 1 Cyclopsis enemy card.

deck.name: HEAD OF CYCLOPSIS (Damaged)
deck.description: Each time the Rangers use a Zord ability, deal 3 damage.

deck.name: CORE OF CYCLOPSIS (Damaged)
deck.description: When this card is flipped to this side, immediately deal 10 damage, divided among the Rangers as they choose.

deck.name: RIGHT ARM OF CYCLOPSIS (Damaged)
deck.description: Each time Cyclopsis deals damage, increase that damage by 1.

deck.name: LEFT ARM OF CYCLOPSIS (Damaged)
deck.description: Each time Cyclopsis deals damage, increase that damage by 1.

deck.name: RIGHT LEG OF CYCLOPSIS (Damaged)
deck.description: At the start of each battle, each Ranger must place 1 card from their hand on the bottom of their deck.

deck.name: LEFT LEG OF CYCLOPSIS (Damaged)
deck.description: At the end of each battle, each Ranger must discard 1 card from the bottom of their deck.

deck.name: DEVASTATING STRIKE
deck.description: Deal 3 damage. Increase this damage by 1 for each defeated Cyclopsis component card.

deck.name: ARC LIGHTNING
deck.description: Deal 2 damage to each Ranger.

deck.name: UNSTOPPABLE FORCE
deck.description: Deal 3 damage to the lead Ranger.

deck.name: MISSILE BARRAGE
deck.description: Drain 1 [ENERGY]. Deal 4 damage, divided among the Rangers as they choose.

deck.name: PHANTOM BEAST STANCE
deck.description: While this card is in play, each time a Ranger plays a card that is not the first card played that turn, deal 3 damage to that Ranger.

deck.name: FEROCIOUS ROAR
deck.description: Skip the next 2 Ranger turns in this battle.

deck.name: RINZIN TECHNIQUE
deck.description: Once this card has resolved, drain 1 [ENERGY] at the end of each enemy turn in this battle.

deck.name: BEAST KING FANG
deck.description: Once this card has resolved, deal 4 damage to the lead Ranger at the end of each enemy turn in this battle.

deck.name: BEAST KING CLAWS
deck.description: Once this card has resolved, deal 2 damage to each Ranger at the end of each enemy turn in this battle.

deck.name: PIRATE QUEEN
deck.description: While this card is in play, all foot soldier cards gain the GUARD keyword and have +1 health.

deck.name: VIVA LA DIVA!
deck.description: Deal 4 damage each to half of the Rangers in this battle (rounded up). Increase this damage by 1 for each Divatox card that has been defeated or discarded.

deck.name: DEPTH CHARGE
deck.description: While this card is in play, after each Ranger attack resolves, deal 1 damage to that Ranger. Increase this damage by 1 for each [MISS] result rolled during that attack.

deck.name: EYE OF CHAOS
deck.description: Roll 1 die. On a [MISS] result, drain 3 [ENERGY]. On a [HIT] result, deal 3 damage to each Ranger. On a [HIT][HIT] result, do both.

deck.name: FIRE TORPEDOES
deck.description: Two different Rangers must each discard the bottom 2 cards of their deck.

deck.name: SHADOW AXE
deck.description: Deal an amount of damage to the lead Ranger equal to the total number of cards in their hand and deck. If this effect defeats that Ranger, repeat it with the new lead Ranger.

deck.name: DARK TITHE
deck.description: While this card is in play, deal an amount of damage at the end of each turn equal to the total amount of [ENERGY] spent and drained during that turn. When this card resolves, drain 3 [ENERGY].

deck.name: CONQUERER’S AURA
deck.description: Deal an amount of damage equal to the total health value of all enemy cards in play, divided among the Rangers as they choose.

deck.name: EMPEROR’S RIDE

deck.name: FRAGMENTATION BLAST
deck.description: Deal 6 damage to each Ranger. Each Ranger may spend 1 [ENERGY] to reduce the damage they suffer by 3.

deck.name: DELETION BEAM
